Enjoyable to play with friends. There's a big learning gap in the beginning, but after figuring out how to play, it's a great game.

apparently it takes alot for the sweaty ass killers to wipe the sweat from their faces which is clearly why there is so much damn face camping by these dudes. Its a good game but holy fuck killer take a perc and relax please. :)

Sure i like it. A nice mix of a challenge and horror. Would recommend.
Играю за 4 пепел кидает к  1 крови, вне зависимости за кого играешь выживший/убийца.
Muy buen juego, la verdad muy divertido lo unico malo es que demora una barbaridad en encontrar partida

If you love getting extremely annoyed at the stupidest stuff, this game will be PERFECT for you! Be prepared to join an unreasonably toxic community and be baffled by the antics of random teammates! Good luck, solider.

Muito divertido, tanto jogando de surv com os amigos em swf como de killer. Leva um tempo para aprender os loops e os perks e o ponto negativo fica por conta da quantidade de dlcs (são necessárias pois o jogo base vem com poucos personagens).
el juego este esta On Point, salvo los petes que usan a la que se teletransporta y a la legion, son todos putos esos
Don't play this game. I can't sleep anymore I just spend all night thinking about huntress holding me in her arms.

Si buscas un juego de miedo y supervivencia este juego te va a gustar, este juego tiene una variación de mapas increibles aparte los supervivientes y asesinos estan muy bien hechos cada uno con sus habilidades lo unico que no me gusta es que hay muchos bugs
Just generally a fun game.  Don't get competitive, don't be a jerk, and everyone has a good time!
El juego esta muy muy divertido,se disfruta mucho con y sin amigos así que lo recomiendo al 100%

It'll be tough jumping into this without the basics of knowing what to do, my advice is watching videos and streams like other good sports in this game would tell you. But overall, this game does have an amazing play style and development team that makes this happen. As either Survivor or Killer you'll have things you can and can't cope with, just bare with what happens and learn how to cope with it in the next games.
its so hard but good games !!
i like it but the queue times are annoying
Great Game very fun! confirmed im a real comment 2 haHA!

ЗАСТРЯЛ В ЕБАНОЕ ТЕКСТУРЕ 
Я СТОЯЛ В ЕБУЧЕЙ ТЕКСТУРЕ 3 МИНУТЫ 3 МИНУТЫ БЛЯТЬ 
КО МНЕ ПОДОШЁЛ МАНЬЯК СТАКНУЛ ФАЗУ И УБИЛ
Great game, lots of fun with a full team of friends.
oyuna giriş yapamıyorum cloudıd falan diyor bilen varsa yazsın lütfen
every match is refreshing and gameplay loop never seems to get old

Tolles Spiel. Schön schaurig und alles. 
Das einzige was mich stört ist, dass nach der Season alle ränge zurückgesetzt werden und man eben dann auch mit absoluten Profis zusammen spielt. Skins sind cool und die Community ist (meistens) sozial :D

Edit: (548 Stunden) Nach mehreren Spielstunden kann ich sagen, dass die Community auf Survivor-Seite recht toxisch ist, da sich die meisten Survivor aufregen, wenn sie sterben, weil... naja... böser Killer bringt einen um und so... darf er ja nicht... Ach nee, GENAU DAS ist sein JOB! Also PLS chillt doch <3  
Sonst ist das Game immernoch empfehlenswert. Die Devs haben viele gute Updates dieses Jahr raus gebracht.
The Developers care so much and i love it

Люди которые читают этот отзыв, не в коем случае не покупайте эту игру, разработчики данной игры е б а н ы е ХАЛТУРЩИКИ, постоянные баги которые не фиксятся неделями, вот реальность которая ждет вас после покупки данной игры.
THIS WHOLE GAMES PLAYER BASE IS EITHER TOXIC OR ASS AT THE GAME OR, YOUR A TWITCH/YOUTUBER AND ARE GOOD AND NOT TOXIC. ITS ONLY THOSE FOUR OPTIONS
